attributes.action: Make local London Authorities provide more free motorcycle parking bays.
attributes.background: I had to attend a meeting today in London so took my motorcycle rather than the car as there are no tube stations near. most of the on street parking is for cars and I could not find a bike bay, all the provided motorcycle bays were full. I got a ticket for being in a car bay even though I had paid.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of local councils, not the Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to place a legal duty on all councils to provide a minimum level of parking for motorcycles.
